title: Wall Street Breakfast August 26: Trump Says China 'Wants To Make A Deal'
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Welcome to Seeking Alpha’s Wall Street Breakfast, your daily source of market news and analysis. Subscribe to this podcast on Apple Podcasts, Google Podcasts, Spotify, and Stitcher. Today is Monday, August 26th and I am your host, Steve Brown. Our top stories today: Trump says China ‘wants to make a deal’; Trump ordered U.S. firms to leave China, but his authority is limited; and the Yuan slumps to historic lows. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:summary:
Welcome to Seeking Alpha’s Wall Street Breakfast, your daily source of market news and analysis.  Subscribe to this podcast on Apple Podcasts, Google Podcasts, Spotify, and Stitcher.  Today is Monday, August 26th and I am your host, Steve Brown. Our top stories today: Trump says China ‘wants to make a deal’; Trump ordered U.S. firms to leave China, but his authority is limited; and the Yuan slumps to historic lows.
